meanings.definition: Adjacent to the curb of a street.
meanings.sent1: The curbside parking spots were all taken.
meanings.sent2: She walked along the curbside path to reach the store.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a cozy spot on the curbside bench.
meanings.sent4: His curbside manners were impeccable, always helping others.
meanings.sent5: The bright red fire hydrant stood out on the curbside.

meanings.definition: The side of a street next to the curb.
meanings.sent1: The children played on the curbside, away from the traffic.
meanings.sent2: Cars were parked along the curbside, making it hard to see.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel darted across the curbside, surprising the pedestrians.
meanings.sent4: She set up a lemonade stand on the curbside, attracting customers.
meanings.sent5: The delivery truck stopped at the curbside to unload packages.

meanings.definition: A location or area next to the curb of a street.
meanings.sent1: The curbside was lined with colorful flowers in bloom.
meanings.sent2: People gathered at the curbside to watch the parade.
meanings.sent3: The dog eagerly sniffed around the curbside for any scraps.
meanings.sent4: The street performer entertained the crowd at the curbside.
meanings.sent5: The bus stopped at the curbside to pick up passengers.
